Question
========
  
For a 2x2 factorial design, the following results occur:

A1B1 = 20, A1B2 = 40, A2B1 = 40, A2B2 = 20

Which of the following answers is TRUE?


  
Answerlist
----------
* There is one main effect and an interaction
* There is one interaction, but no main effect
* There are two main effects but no interaction
* There are two main effects and one interaction
